text: Altar of Dementia: Each player sacrifices a creature and mills X cards where X is that creature's power
Codex Shredder: Each player mills 1 card
The Raid Monster gains 5 life and removes 5 poison counters
Sands of Delirium: Each player mills {x} cards
Place {xp} 0/2 Ornithopters (flying) creature tokens in front of the Raid Monster
Grinding Station: Each player mills 3 cards
Tormod's Crypt: Exile each player's graveyard
Rocket Launcher: Each player rolls a dice, player(s) with the lowest roll take {x} damage
Wheel of Fortune: Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards
